meanings.sent1: The book was published for everyone to read.
meanings.sent2: The magazine had many published articles for readers.
meanings.sent3: The published announcement brought joy to many.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a published invitation to happiness.
meanings.sent5: The published sign caught everyone's attention.

meanings.definition: Printed and distributed for public consumption
meanings.sent1: The new published book is selling well.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy reading the published works of this author.
meanings.sent3: The library had a collection of published materials.
meanings.sent4: The published newspaper was delivered early in the morning.
meanings.sent5: The published pamphlet had useful information.

meanings.definition: Announced or made known to others
meanings.sent1: She published her decision to everyone.
meanings.sent2: The company published the new policy for employees.
meanings.sent3: He published his excitement about the upcoming event.
meanings.sent4: The news was published far and wide.
meanings.sent5: The author published his latest novel to great acclaim.
